-----Original Message-----
Sent: Thu 12/9/2004 11:20 AM
To: Radiance general discussion
Cc:


Dear all,

Very nicely done, indeed. Allow me to add a few more links to this
reading list:
- The joy of visual perception: http://www.yorku.ca/eye/toc.htm (a
classic by now)
- SynthLight chapter 1: Fundamentals of lighting and vision:
http://www.learn.londonmet.ac.uk/packages/synthlight/handbook/index.html
(highly recommended! Sexy looking PDF to print out and put under your
pillow)
- Colour and vision database: http://cvrl.ucl.ac.uk/ (lots of data sets
on all things related to lighting and vision, e.g. v(lambda), rods and
cones sensitivity, chromaticity charts)

Cheers

Axel
